backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining surgery case types and CRUD methods with access control and in‑memory storage.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related source files, components, and test IDs for offline caching and sync functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like document summarizing major frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base theme defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root div and bootstrapping the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, authentication gating, layout, and theming.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth button handling Internet Identity login/logout and clearing caches and queues.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty placeholder component for user profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating and editing surgery cases with validation, demographics autofill, and checkbox fields.
frontend/src/components/cases/QuickAddDe: Component for parsing demographic text or OCR-scanned images into structured fields and applying them to a case.
frontend/src/components/cases/ToDoSectio: Renders a case-specific to‑do list with add, toggle, and delete actions using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with top navigation, footer, and an offline sync listener.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing app title, identity info, offline status, and login button.
frontend/src/components/offline/OfflineS: Displays online/offline status, pending sync count, and controls for syncing and viewing queued changes.
Loads pending offline operations on mount to enable background sync.
frontend/src/components/offline/PendingC: Dialog listing pending offline operations with retry and clear‑all controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status and exposes isOnline and isOffline flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineSync.ts: Handles syncing queued offline operations to the backend when connectivity returns, updating operation status and clearing completed items.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating case data with offline caching and queued fallback operations for network failures.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom light/dark clinical-themed color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single case with edit and delete functionality, supporting offline fallback using cached case data.
frontend/src/pages/CaseListPage.tsx: Shows searchable and sortable case list with offline indicators and supports CSV import/export operations.
frontend/src/pages/NewCasePage.tsx: Page component that renders the new case form, handles create-case submission, and navigates back after success or error.
frontend/src/types/offlineOps.ts: Defines TypeScript types for all offline queue operations such as creating, updating, and deleting cases or todos.
frontend/src/utils/caseMatching.ts: Provides a utility to find the most recent case matching a given MRN by sorting by arrival date and ID.
frontend/src/utils/dateTime.ts: Contains helpers for converting between backend bigint timestamps and human-readable or HTML date strings.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsParser.ts: Parses free‑text demographics into structured fields like MRN, names, dates, species, and breed, returning found, missing, and uncertain fields.
frontend/src/utils/ocrText.ts: Wrapper for browser TextDetector API to extract text from images and return structured OCR results with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/offlineDb.ts: IndexedDB helper module for caching case lists, individual cases, and storing queued operations for offline use.
frontend/src/utils/offlineQueue.ts: Manages the offline operation queue with functions to enqueue, fetch, update, and remove queued operations in IndexedDB.
Implements CSV parsing and validation for surgery cases, including field normalization, enum parsing, and boolean handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins such as typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, requirements, and features focused on adding offline caching and sync behavior for surgery case data.
